    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, android.widget.Filter.FilterListener
    public class HashtagEditText
extends android.widget.MultiAutoCompleteTextView
    Editable text view that auto-completes based on the list of registered tags
